title: Schema for Informationsverbund Description
description: Schema for the AI's analysis of the Informationsverbund scope (Chapter 1.4).

kurzbezeichnung.description: The short, official name of the Informationsverbund.

kurzbeschreibung.description: A concise summary of the audit scope (Geltungsbereich), including business processes, locations, and applications.

finding.description: A structured finding regarding the quality and clarity of the scope definition.

category.description: The category of the finding: 'OK' if no issue, 'AG' (Minor Deviation), 'AS' (Major Deviation), or 'E' (Recommendation).

description.description: A detailed, evidence-based description of the finding. If category is 'OK', this should be a brief confirmation.
